tool_description: Evaluates workplace incidents against regulatory requirements and generates compliance checklists for OSHA, state regulations, and industry-specific standards.

incident_id.description: Unique identifier of the incident report

injuries_occurred.description: Whether injuries occurred in the incident

injury_severity.description: Severity of injuries if any occurred

industry_type.description: Industry classification (manufacturing, construction, healthcare, office, other)

state_jurisdiction.description: State where incident occurred for state-specific requirements

error_messages: Invalid incident ID: Provide a valid incident_id that exists in the system.
Invalid industry type: Use one of [manufacturing, construction, healthcare, office, retail, transportation, other].
Invalid injury severity: Use one of [none, minor, moderate, major, critical].
Missing state jurisdiction: Provide a valid US state abbreviation.
Severity inconsistency: If injuries_occurred is false, injury_severity should be 'none'.
Fatality reporting conflict: Fatalities require immediate regulatory reporting regardless of other settings.
usage: Provide incident_id, incident_type, injuries_occurred, industry_type, and state_jurisdiction. Include injury_severity if injuries occurred and set fatality_involved if applicable. The tool will generate relevant compliance requirements.

compliance_checklist.description: List of compliance requirements to fulfill
